summary: VICE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES - Sarah Huckabee Sanders is an emerging front-runner in the race to become picked by former President Donald Trump as his Vice-Presidential running mate. Sarah Huckabee represents a new era of conservative leadership targeting broad reforms that can energize a young population. Mixing traditional conservatism with progressive reforms, Sarah Huckabee is the perfect running mate for Trump to capture young voters, women, mothers, minorities, and center-leaning voters unsure of the direction that some of the far-right VP candidates might embody.
